autodelete.permission_denied: ❌ Only level {level}+ members can manage auto-delete.
autodelete.toggle.disabled: ℹ️ Command {command} will no longer be auto-deleted.
autodelete.list.empty: ℹ️ Auto-delete is not configured for any commands.
documentation.sections.overview.title: ℹ️ Main commands
documentation.sections.moderation.title: 🛡 Moderation module
documentation.sections.moderation.conten: /kick — kick a user without a ban.
/modlevel — assign moderation levels (0 = members, 5 = chat creator; levels control all moderation actions).
/restrict — list members with a specific moderation level.
/restrictcommand — limit a command to a specific moderator level.
documentation.sections.filters.title: 🚦 Filters
documentation.sections.filters.content.0: /filteradd — add a new rule (reply to a message).
documentation.sections.filters.content.4: /filterclear — remove all filters in the chat.
documentation.sections.filters.content.5: Use {randomUser}, {randomMention} or {randomRpUser} in templates to mention a random member.
documentation.sections.filters.content.6: Tags {argument} and {argumentNoQuestion} insert text after the trigger (with or without question marks).
documentation.sections.autodelete.title: ♻️ Auto-delete
documentation.sections.roleplay.title: 🎲 Roleplay
statistics.top.unsupported_chat: ❌ This command is only available in group chats.
statistics.top.unknown_period: ❌ Unknown period '{value}'. Use one of: day, week, month, all.
statistics.top.empty: No activity recorded for this period yet.
roleplay.nick.usage: Usage: /rpnick new_nickname (can be used in reply)
roleplay.nick.permission_denied: ❌ Only level {level}+ members can set nicknames for other users.
roleplay.nick.empty: ❌ The nickname must not be empty.
roleplay.nick.self_success: ✅ Your RP nickname has been updated!
roleplay.nick.level_denied: ❌ You cannot change the nickname of someone with a higher level.
roleplay.clear.permission_denied: ❌ Only level {level}+ members can reset nicknames for other users.

roleplay.clear.other_success: 🗑 RP nickname for {profile_reference} has been reset.
roleplay.clear.level_denied: ❌ You cannot reset the nickname of someone with a higher level.
roleplay.clear.not_found: ℹ️ No saved RP nickname was found.
roleplay.add.permission_denied: ❌ Only level {level}+ members can add RP commands.
roleplay.delete.permission_denied: ❌ Only level {level}+ members can delete RP commands.

filters.permission_denied: ❌ Only level {level}+ members can manage filters.
filters.add.usage: Usage: /filteradd [--regex] word (command must reply to a message)
filters.error.reply_required: ❌ The command must reply to a message containing the template.
filters.error.empty_template: ⚠ The template must contain text or media.
filters.list.empty: ℹ️ No templates found for this word.
filters.replace.usage: Usage: /filterreplace [--regex] word id (command must reply to a message)
filters.replace.reply_required: ❌ The command must reply to a message with a new template.
filters.replace.not_found: ⚠ The specified template was not found.
filters.remove.not_found: ⚠ Template with this ID not found.
filters.clear.success: 🧹 All templates for {trigger_label} have been deleted.
filters.clear.empty: ℹ️ There were no templates for this word.
filters.list_all.empty: ℹ️ There are no filters for this chat yet.
moderation.error.cannot_moderate_admin: Cannot moderate members with equal or higher level
moderation.error.no_permission: You don't have permission to restrict members
moderation.ban.usage:
❌ Invalid usage! Examples:
/ban @user 1d spam - Ban user for 1 day
/ban 2h @user - Ban user for 2 hours
/ban @user - Permanent ban
Or reply to a message with /ban 1d
moderation.error.target_admin_funny: Hey buddy, I'm not scared—watch your words.
moderation.error.chat_owner_funny: Bold move trying to remove the chat owner!
moderation.error.self_action_funny: That's a bit much—you can't restrict yourself.
moderation.mute.usage:
❌ Invalid usage! Examples:
/mute @user 1h spam
/mute 30m @user
/mute @user - Permanent mute
moderation.warn.usage: ❌ Please specify a user to warn or reply to their message.
moderation.warn.auto_mute_notice: 🔨 **Maximum warnings reached! User will be muted.**
moderation.kick.usage: ❌ Please specify a user to kick or reply to their message.
moderation.unban.usage: ❌ Please specify a user to unban.
moderation.unmute.usage: ❌ Please specify a user to unmute.
moderation.unwarn.usage: ❌ Please specify a user to remove warning from.
moderation.unwarn.success: ✅ Warning removed. User now has {count} warnings.
moderation.level.invalid: ❌ Level must be a number between 0 and 5.
moderation.level.reply_required: ❌ Reply to a user's message or specify a username/ID to set their level.
moderation.level.user_not_found: ❌ Could not find that user. Reply to a message or provide a valid username/ID.
moderation.level.insufficient: ❌ You cannot change the level of someone with equal or higher rank.
moderation.level.too_high: ❌ You cannot assign a level higher than your own.
moderation.restrict.usage: Usage: /restrict <0-5> — show members with that exact level.
moderation.restrict.range: ❌ Level must be a number between 0 and 5.
moderation.restrict.level0: Level 0 users currently have no special permissions.
moderation.command_restrict.permission_d: ❌ Only level {level}+ members can configure command restrictions.

moderation.command_restrict.invalid_comm: ❌ Please provide a command to restrict.
moderation.command_restrict.cleared: 🧹 Restriction removed for {command}. Anyone can use it now.
settings.language.permission_denied: ❌ Only level {level}+ members can change the chat language.
/menu — leave the current menu and return to the main view.
moderation.menu.exit_confirmation: 🏠 You're back in the main menu. Use /help to see available commands.

moderation.report.selection.out_of_range: The selected number is outside of the available range.
moderation.report.selection.report_missi: This report is no longer available.
moderation.report.selection.no_text: No text was attached to this message.
moderation.report.selection.appeal_missi: This appeal is no longer available.

entertainment.jokes.dark_mode: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs!
entertainment.jokes.light_bulb: How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb? None, that's a hardware problem!
